amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.para: All cities and villages may create a special improvement district for the purpose of replacing, reconstructing, or repairing an existing street, alley, water line, sewer line, or any other such improvement. Except as provided in sections 19-2428 to 19-2431, the city council or board of trustees shall have power to assess, to the extent of such special benefits, the costs of such improvements upon the properties found especially benefited thereby, whether or not such properties were previously assessed for the same general purpose. In creating such special improvement district, the city council or board of trustees shall follow procedures applicable to the creation and assessment of the same type of improvement district as otherwise provided by law.
